name: Braised Pig
description:
A penguin named Pig with a Flame-Thrower

In a strategy/rogue-lite, that let you experience the life of Pig and this godly ascension with this Flame-Thrower.

Now, there is a Prototype of the Tiles and Movements system.

Controls:

Left-Click / Select A Unit & Move A Unit

Right-Click / Move The Camera

Scroll Wheel / Zoom

Equipe:

Deville Louis / Game Developer

Falzon Anaëlle / Game Artiste
